com.simulus.view.map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.Group
          • com.simulus.view.map.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Map
extends javafx.scene.Group
    This class is the central management facility for a map's storage and management. It stores references to all of the map's intersections (and their threads for trafficlights), its entrypoints, and manages all currently present vehicles.

    • Method Detail

      • drawMap

        public void drawMap(javafx.scene.layout.Pane canvasPane)
        Draws the current state of the map on either the editor's or the mainApp's canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvasPane - The canvas this map should be drawn on

      • spawnRandomCar

        public Car spawnRandomCar(Behaviour b)
        Spawns a car at a randomly selected entrypoint of the map.
        Parameters:
        b - The desired behavior of the spawning car.
        Returns:
        The spawned car

      • spawnRandomTruck

        public void spawnRandomTruck()
        Spawns a truck at a randomly selected entrypoint of the map.

      • addSingle

        public void addSingle(Tile tile)
        Adds the passed tile to the tiles[][] array.
        Parameters:
        tile - - The tile to be added

      • removeSingle

        public void removeSingle(Tile tile)
        Removes the passed tile from the tiles[][] array.
        Parameters:
        tile - - The tile to be removed

      • selectRandomEntryPoint

        public Lane selectRandomEntryPoint()
        Returns:
        A random entrypoint (Lane) or null if no free entrypoint has been found after a certain number of tries.

      • spawnAmbulance

        public void spawnAmbulance()
        Spawns an ambulance at a random, available entrypoint.

      • addGroup

        public void addGroup(TileGroup g)
        Add the tiles contained by the passed tilegroup to the current instance of the map. If a North/Southbound lane is at the top/bottom-edge of the map, it becomes an entrypoint, equivalently do East/Westbound lanes at the left/right-edge of the map.
        Parameters:
        g - The TileGroup to add to the map's tiles.

      • setRedTrafficLight

        public void setRedTrafficLight(int tileX,
                               int tileY,
                               Direction dir)
        Makes a specific tile a red light.
        Parameters:
        tileX - The grid x-coordinate of the tile.
        tileY - The grid y-coordinate of the tile.
        dir - The direction that should be stopped by the red light.

      • setGreenTrafficLight

        public void setGreenTrafficLight(int tileX,
                                 int tileY)
        Sets a currently red-light-tile to be green.
        Parameters:
        tileX - The grid x-coordinate of the tile.
        tileY - The grid y-coordinate of the tile.

      • updateMap

        public void updateMap()
        Computes one simulation step. Is executed with each tick.

      • pauseTransitions

        public void pauseTransitions()
        Stops all vehicles that are currently in a transition. Vehicles are in transitions when they go through an intersection or when they overtake/pass an obstacle.

      • removeGroup

        public void removeGroup(TileGroup g)
        Removes a group of tiles from the map, a tile group can be either a Road or Intersection.
        Parameters:
        g - - The tile group to be removed

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap(java.io.File mapFile)
        Loads a Map from an XML file and draws it onto the MainApp's canvas
        Parameters:
        mapFile - The XML file containing the map-data.

      • loadEditorMap

        public void loadEditorMap(java.io.File mapFile)
        Loads a Map from an XML file and draws it onto the EditorApp's canvas
        Parameters:
        mapFile - The XML file containing the map-data.

      • removeVehicle

        public void removeVehicle(Vehicle v)
        Removes a vehicle from the screen. To prevent ConcurrentModification-Exceptions, the vehicles that should be removed are temporarily stored in toBeRemoved and then removed in the main simulation loop.
        Parameters:
        v - Vehicle to be removed

      • randomiseTrafficLights

        public void randomiseTrafficLights()
        Give all intersections a new random switchtime between 2 and 5 secs.

      • showAllIntersectionPaths

        public void showAllIntersectionPaths()
        See Also:
        Intersection.showAllPaths()

      • hideAllIntersectionsPaths

        public void hideAllIntersectionsPaths()
        See Also:
        Intersection.hideAllPaths()

      • getAverageSpeed

        public double getAverageSpeed()
        Returns:
        The average speed of all vehicles currently on the map.

      • getCongestionValue

        public double getCongestionValue()
        Returns:
        The percentage of road-tiles that are currently occupied [0.0;1.0]

      • getAvgWaitingTime

        public double getAvgWaitingTime()
        Returns:
        The average number of ticks in which a vehicle did not move on its way through the map.

      • getAvgEmWaitingTime

        public double getAvgEmWaitingTime()
        Returns:
        The average number of ticks in which an emergency vehicle did not move on its way through the map.

      • stopChildThreads

        public void stopChildThreads()
        Interrupts all trafficLightThreads that are spawned by the map. Is used when the simulation is restart.

      • getTiles

        public Tile[][] getTiles()

      • getVehicles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> getVehicles()

        public int getVehicleCount()

        public void setTruckColorOption(VehicleColorOption o)

        public void setTiles(Tile[][] tiles)
